text: 1:7 Ofa Gami 10:9; 1 Korin 4:1; Efesus 5:18; 1 Pita 5:2E fo, Kraisɨn adarazir garir gumazamizir dapaniba, me Godɨn ingangaribar garir gumazamiziba. Kamaghɨn me deraghvɨra daru, egh gumazamizibar damazimɨn deraghvɨra ikɨ, kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan kogh suam, me ziar ekiam inisɨ me gativagh men ganam. Egh me zuamɨram anɨngaghan markɨ. Egh dɨpar onganir avɨribar aman markɨ. Egh me tintinibar gumazamizibav soghan markɨ, egh me uari baghvɨra dagɨar avɨriba inisɨ, nɨghnɨghan markɨ.
